```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(waffle)
```


```{r}
starbucks <- read_csv("C:/Users/inkyscope/Documents/projectR/datavizRscope/2018/week6/data/Starbucks.csv")
timhorton <- read_csv("C:/Users/inkyscope/Documents/projectR/datavizRscope/2018/week6/data/Timhorton.csv")
dunkin <- read_csv("C:/Users/inkyscope/Documents/projectR/datavizRscope/2018/week6/data/Dunkin.csv")
```


```{r}
num_location <- c(Starbucks = nrow(starbucks),
                  'Timhortons' = nrow(timhorton),
                  'Dunkin Donuts\n(only USA)' = nrow(dunkin))

plot_caffe <- waffle(num_location / 30,
                     rows = 25,
                     colors = c("#036635", "#dc0f2d", "#ff671f"), #Dunkin #DA1884(magenta), #653819(brown)
                     legend_pos = "bottom",
                     title = "Number of Coffee Stores in the World",
                     xlab = "1 square: 30 places")

ggsave("W6_GlobalCoffeeChains.png", width = 20, height = 12, units = "cm" )
```
